OCC.DAT:
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME= #Comment
#Comment end_of_references
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_mappings #Comment end_of_mappings
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_symbols #Comment end_of_symbols
#Comment ----------------------------------------------

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate clear() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Clear' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->clear()
#else clear
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate load() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Load' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->load()
#else retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate load() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Load' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->load()
#else retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate save() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Save' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->save()
#else store if ($status < 0) message $text(1500) ; error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1723) ; no change else commit if ($status < 0) rollback else message $text(1805) ; Ok endif endif endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate deleteall() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Delete All' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->deleteall()
#else erase if ($status < 0) message $text(1763) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1634) ;not allowed else message $text(1806) ;Ok commit endif endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate save() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by an 'OK' Button). if ($formmod) $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->save() ; save modifications if ($status < 0) ; check negative status from Save() return (-1) endif endif
exit (0) #else #endif

entry loc_Go variables numeric var_nUsourceCount string var_sTransText, var_sUSAText endvariables
if (debug_checkbox.xxx1) debug
;get all usa u_source records that start with MSG_F clear/e "usource" ulan.usource = "USA" ulabel.usource = "MSG_FA&uALL;" retrieve/e "usource"
;loop through all usa usources, populate xxx2 with the translations for every languages forentity ("usource") creocc "xxx2" message_name.xxx2 = ulabel.usource #for Languages = (USA, DUT, GER, FRN, HEL, ROU, ITA, SPN, CRO, SLV, FIN) $language = "<Languages>" var_sTransText = $text("%%ulabel.usource") if ($language = "USA") var_sUSAText = var_sTransText endif ;need to make sure you don't have the same text as the USA message as Uniface $text function will revert to getting the USA text if (var_sTransText[1,4] = "8006" | (var_sUSAText = var_sTransText & $language != "USA") ) var_sTransText = "" endif <Languages>.xxx2 = var_sTransText #endfor endfor
call loc_SetupHTML end
entry loc_SetupHTML variables string var_sColList, var_sMessageList, var_sSuppressList, var_sEditor, var_sDropList, var_sOptionList, var_sCurrDel string var_sFieldPrivilege, var_sFieldName, var_sTempList, var_sCommit numeric var_nLength, var_nCounter endvariables
$properties(JS_GRID)="UnifaceKeys=Esc,F1,F2,F3,F4,F8,F9,F10,ctrl+a,ctrl+b,ctrl+c,ctrl+e,ctrl+f,ctrl+g,ctrl+h,ctrl+i,ctrl+k,ctrl+l,ctrl+m,ctrl+n,ctrl+p,ctrl+r,ctrl+s,ctrl+t,ctrl+u,ctrl+v,ctrl+w,ctrl+x,ctrl+y,ctrl+z" call loc_LoadGrid
; Load Column Data. var_sColList = "Message Name&uSEP;USA&uSEP;DUT&uSEP;GER&uSEP;FRN&uSEP;HEL&uSEP;ROU&uSEP;ITA&uSEP;SPN&uSEP;CRO&uSEP;SLV&uSEP;FIN"
var_sOptionList = "enableColumnReorder=false;numField=occ_num;editable=true;showFooterRow=false;suppressNumColumn=true;headerRowHeight=50"
$fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:MoreOptions", var_sOptionList)
;function AddColumn(id, name, width, hidden, order, editor) ;id - we usually use the field name from the database ;name - the label to show on the column, we usually use $text here so the label is translated and consistant across the app ;width - we store this in a user table typically, here hard coded ;hidden - whether to hide the column or not, you still need to add it so the user can choose to show it ;order - this is the order that the columns will be shown in, we save this to the user table as well ;editor - slick grids supports many different types of fields to show in the grid ; 00 - text ; 01 - integer ; 02 - date ; 03 - yes/no select ; 04 - checkbox ; 05 - progress bar ; 06 - long text box ; 07 - button ; 08 - file picker
var_nCounter = 1 $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:AddColumn", "message_name", "Message Name", 140, "F", var_nCounter, "00")
;column names on the grid have to be lowercase, I'm not sure why #for Languages = (usa, dut, ger, frn, hel, rou, ita, spn, cro, slv, fin) var_nCounter+=1 $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:AddColumn", "<Languages>", "<Languages>", 120, "F", var_nCounter, "00") #endfor
; Send messages to widget so nothing is hard-coded. ; commented out here, but right clicking on the grid shows menu, you can send as list of that text and a $text from uniface ; that information is translated ;$fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:GetTranslations", var_sMessageList)
; End of setup, show grid. call loc_UpdateJSGrid
$fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:Style") $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:ShowGrid") end ;loc_SetupHTML
entry loc_LoadGrid variables string var_sHtmlPath endvariables ;Load grid properties var_sHtmlPath = $logical("HTML_DIRECTORY") scan var_sHtmlPath, ":" if ($result > 0) ;hard coded path $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("loadURL", "%%var_sHtmlPath%%%JSGrid.html") else ;relative path $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("loadURL", "%%$ldir()%%var_sHtmlPath%%%JSGrid.html") endif end
entry loc_UpdateJSGrid variables string var_sList endvariables $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:ClearData")
;loop through the xxx2 records and load the grid data one row at a time setocc "xxx2", 1 forentity ("xxx2") occ_num.xxx2 = $curocc(xxx2) putlistitems/occ var_sList "xxx2" $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:LoadRow", var_sList) endfor $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:Style") end
entry loc_OpenExcel ;store the CSV file in report directory and open it in EXCEL params string par_isCSV:in ;comma delimited list that comes from the grid endparams variables string var_sReportResultLoc, var_sExcelPath numeric var_nUniqueNum endvariables
if (par_isCSV = "") return (0) ;get the directory to create the CSV file
var_sReportResultLoc = $logical("CSV_DIRECTORY")
;add a datetime to the file to make it unique var_sReportResultLoc = "%%var_sReportResultLoc%%%\Translations.csv" if $fileexists(var_sReportResultLoc) lfiledelete "%%var_sReportResultLoc" if ($status >= 0) filedump par_isCSV, "%%var_sReportResultLoc" endif else filedump par_isCSV, "%%var_sReportResultLoc" endif call loc_FindExcelPath(var_sExcelPath) if (var_sExcelPath != "" & var_sReportResultLoc != "") spawn "%%"%%var_sExcelPath%%" %%"%%var_sReportResultLoc%%"" endif return (0)
end
entry loc_FindExcelPath ;This proc will find the path for Microsoft Office Excel.exe params string par_osExcelPath:out endparams variables string var_sSetting, var_sSettings, var_sOfficePath, var_sOfficeDirList, var_sDir, var_sProgramFilesPath, var_sExcelPath, var_sExcelLoc endvariables
var_sExcelLoc = $logical("Excel_path") if ($fileexists(var_sExcelLoc) & var_sExcelLoc != "") par_osExcelPath = var_sExcelLoc return (0) endif var_sSettings = $setting("", "ProgramFiles&uALL;", "ENVVARS") forlist var_sSetting in var_sSettings var_sProgramFilesPath = $setting("", $idpart(var_sSetting), "ENVDATA") var_sOfficePath = $concat(var_sProgramFilesPath, "\Microsoft Office\root\Office&uALL;") var_sOfficeDirList = $dirlist(var_sOfficePath, "DIR") forlist var_sDir in var_sOfficeDirList var_sExcelPath = $concat(var_sProgramFilesPath, "\Microsoft Office\root\", var_sDir, "\Excel.exe") if $fileexists(var_sExcelPath) par_osExcelPath = var_sExcelPath return (0) endif endfor var_sOfficePath = $concat(var_sProgramFilesPath, "\Microsoft Office\Office&uALL;") var_sOfficeDirList = $dirlist(var_sOfficePath, "DIR") forlist var_sDir in var_sOfficeDirList var_sExcelPath = $concat(var_sProgramFilesPath, "\Microsoft Office\", var_sDir, "\Excel.exe") if $fileexists(var_sExcelPath) par_osExcelPath = var_sExcelPath return (0) endif endfor endfor return (-1)
end
#include U:zProcError ; Report an unexpected failure in a proc statement.
;call out to the grid to get a comma delimited list $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:GetCSV")

;call back from grid after it builds a comma delimted list trigger GetCSV params string par_isCSV:in endparams
call loc_OpenExcel(par_isCSV) end
trigger SaveColumns params string par_isList : in endparams
;we save the column sizes and which ones the user hid/showed in this code, it is a user based table end
trigger SetColumnUpdate ;set column update flag after column changed params boolean par_ibColumnChanged : in endparams
;this code will tell will set a flag when the column is changed, this helps with the saving of the column size end
trigger LeaveField params string par_isFieldName : in string par_isValue : in numeric par_inLineNum : in endparams variables string var_sDirection endvariables
;add code here to save changed made in the grid itself back to the table $fieldhandle(JS_GRID)->$widgetoperation("JS:Return", var_sDirection)
end
